General.Name: Torr Metals Inc
General.Description: Torr Metals Inc. engages in the exploration and development of mineral deposits in Canada. It holds a 100% interest in the Latham copper-gold project, which comprises 41 mineral claims covering an area of 49,694 hectares located in northern British Columbia. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1111 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 2J3
